function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decreased access to greenspaces in urban areas","Impact":"Reduced opportunities for human contact with nature and potential health benefits","Mitigation":"Urban planning to prioritize and preserve greenspaces, community advocacy for green initiatives","Technologies":"GIS mapping for urban planning, community engagement platforms for advocacy","People":"Urban residents, particularly those in crowded residential areas","Owner":"Urban planners, local community groups"},{"Description":"Lack of collaboration between health care providers and local nature partnerships","Impact":"Missed potential to leverage the health benefits of the natural environment for human health","Mitigation":"Establishment of formal partnerships, joint initiatives and programs between health care providers and nature partnerships","Technologies":"Healthcare data management systems, environmental impact assessment tools","People":"Healthcare providers, nature partnerships, local communities","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, nature partnerships"}]}
